name: Just a Linear Game
description:
Just a Linear Game is a game created by Douglas Tavares, made during the one-week period for the Community Game Jam.


What is the game about?

The Game is a Side Scroller, 2D Shooter, Metroidvanania.  Where you only have one path to walk.
